SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies.pdf: Página 104
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work 
STUDY CASE. CUSTOMIZE GENERAL ONTOLOGY 
Pruning the MO 
(e.g. the relation 
overlap is not 
necessary in our 
domain ontology) 
Enriching the MO 
We added (a) transitivity to 
the part and properPart 
object properties; (b) 
reflexivity to part; (c) 
asymmetry to 
properPart; and (d) 
antisymmetry to part. 
 
 
OWL 
Evaluating 
We checked that the 
resulting ontology has 
the expected 
attributes
